MST.JO.summary: Mustek Limited procures, assembles, distributes, and services personal computers and complementary information and communications technology (ICT) products in South Africa. It offers 3D printing products; computing products; tablets; displays; energy solutions, such as power back up products, LED lighting products, monitoring systems, batteries, and solar panels; networking and enterprise products; printers and scanners; point-of-sale solutions; training services; and peripherals, including flash memory storage and external USBs. The company was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Midrand, South Africa.
